message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $10,500, which is still a great deal for you. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work!

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,250. I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection, and I'm willing to compromise to make it work.
